name: Night Shift: HappyMart
description:
Congratulations! You got hired at a 24 hour convenience store in an isolated area during the night shift. Your hours are long and the work is mind numbing...as so they say. You soon discover that the woods surrounding the store are haunted. Survive through the night while trying to complete your tasks during your shift!

Notes
  • Controls can be found on the main menu. 
  • My colleague, Cupp, helped me with music. (can be found here)
  • Sounds used from FreeSFX (link), Freesound (link), SoundBible (link), and ZapSplat (link)
Development

This is only the first introduction night. I plan on doing 7 nights with increasing difficulty, add more monsters with special interactions, and more unique tasks.

Please notify me if any bugs or crashes were found and/or what to improve.
